name: Query Intervals II
desc:
Follow up for "Query Intervals":

How about return all intervals that cover the given time?

Note: Please keep your results sorted by the begin time.
code_ruby:
# class Interval
#     attr_accessor :begin_t, :end_t
#     def initialize(b = 0, e = 0)
#         @begin_t, @end_t = b, e
#     end
# end

class Intervals
    # @param intervals, Intervals array
    def initialize(intervals)
    end

    def preprocess()
    end

    # @param time, integer
    # @return Intervals array
    def query(time)
    end
end
